mapper.select: SELECT vendor_id, name FROM vendor_m WHERE status = 'APPROVED'

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.name, p.price, p.stock_count AS stockCount, p.product_image AS productImage, v.name AS vendor FROM product p JOIN vendor_m v ON p.vendor_id = v.vendor_id WHERE p.vendor_id = #{vendorId} AND p.status = 'APPROVED'
